document.docAuthor: Speybroeck, Jeroen, Beukema, Wouter & Crochet, Pierre-André
document.masterDocTitle: A tentative species list of the European herpetofauna (Amphibia and Reptilia) — an update

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A tentative species list of the European herpetofauna (Amphibia and Reptilia) — an update

subSubSection.paragraph: Order Caudata or Urodela (salamanders and newts)

Family
Salamandridae Goldfuss, 1820
(true salamanders and newts)

arnoldi
Carranza and Amat, 2005
— Montseny Brook Newt
asper (Dugès, 1852 )
— Pyrenean Brook Newt

montanus (Savi, 1838 )
— Corsican Brook Newt
platycephalus (Gravenhorst, 1829 )
— Sardinian Brook Newt

boscai
(Lataste in Blanchard, 1879 ) — Bosca’s Newt
helveticus (Razoumowsky, 1789 )
— Palmate Newt
italicus (Peracca, 1898 )
— Italian Newt

montandoni (Boulenger, 1880 )
— Montandon’s Newt
vulgaris (Linnaeus, 1758 )
— Smooth Newt

corsica (Savi, 1838 )
— Corsican Fire Salamander
lanzai (Nascetti, Andreone, Capula and Bullini, 1988 )
— Lanza’s (Alpine) Salamander
salamandra (Linnaeus, 1758 )
— Fire Salamander

perspicillata (Savi, 1821 )
— Northern Spectacled Salamander
terdigitata (Bonnaterre, 1789 )
— Southern Spectacled Salamander

arntzeni Litvinchuk, Borkin, Dzukić and Kalezić, 1999
— Arntzen’s Crested Newt
carnifex (Laurenti, 1768 )
— Italian Crested Newt
cristatus (Laurenti, 1768 )
— (Great or Northern) Crested Newt
dobrogicus (Kiritzescu, 1903 )
— Danube Crested Newt?
karelinii (Strauch, 1870 )
— Southern Crested Newt — presence in Europe depends on location of

marmoratus (Latreille, 1800 )
— Marbled Newt
pygmaeus (Wolterstorff, 1905 )
— Southern Marbled Newt

)

Agamidae Spix, 1825

Arribas, Džukić and Carranza, 2007
